product_name: The North Face  Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket for men gives you two classics: a waterproof, breathable HyVent rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility.
short_description: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket for men gives you two classics: a waterproof, breathable HyVent rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility.
